   20: 
   21: -module(openssl_session_ticket_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: %% Callback functions
   24: -export([all/0,
   25:          groups/0,
   26:          init_per_suite/1,
   27:          end_per_suite/1,
   28:          init_per_group/2,
   29:          end_per_group/2,
   30:          init_per_testcase/2,
   31:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   32: 
   33: %% Testcases
   34: -export([openssl_server_basic/0,
   35:          openssl_server_basic/1,
   36:          openssl_server_hrr/0,
   37:          openssl_server_hrr/1,
   38:          openssl_server_hrr_multiple_tickets/0,
   39:          openssl_server_hrr_multiple_tickets/1,
   40:          openssl_client_basic/0,
   41:          openssl_client_basic/1,
   42:          openssl_client_hrr/0,
   43:          openssl_client_hrr/1,
   44:          openssl_server_early_data_basic/0,
   45:          openssl_server_early_data_basic/1,
   46:          openssl_server_early_data_big/0,
   47:          openssl_server_early_data_big/1,
   48:          openssl_server_early_data_manual/0,
   49:          openssl_server_early_data_manual/1,
   50:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_big/0,
   51:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_big/1,
   52:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_tickets/0,
   53:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_tickets/1,
   54:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_chacha_tickets/0,
   55:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_chacha_tickets/1,
   56:          openssl_client_early_data_basic/0,
   57:          openssl_client_early_data_basic/1]).
   58: 
   59: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   60: -include("tls_handshake.hrl").
   61: 
   62: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   63: 
   64: -define(SLEEP, 500).
   65: 
   66: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: all() ->
   70:     [
   71:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'}
   72:     ].
   73: 
   74: groups() ->
   75:     [{'tlsv1.3', [], [{group, stateful},
   76:                       {group, stateless},
   77:                       {group, openssl_server}]},
   78:      {openssl_server, [], [openssl_server_basic,
   79:                            openssl_server_hrr,
   80:                            openssl_server_hrr_multiple_tickets,
   81:                            openssl_server_early_data_basic,
   82:                            openssl_server_early_data_big,
   83:                            openssl_server_early_data_manual,
   84:                            openssl_server_early_data_manual_big,
   85:                            openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_tickets,
   86:                            openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_chacha_tickets
   87:                           ]},
   88:      {stateful, [], session_tests()},
   89:      {stateless, [], session_tests()}].
   90: 
   91: session_tests() ->
   92:     [openssl_client_basic,
   93:      openssl_client_hrr,
   94:      openssl_client_early_data_basic].
   95: 
   96: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   97:     Config = ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
   98:     ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config).
   99: 
  100: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  101:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
  102: 
  103: init_per_group(stateful, Config) ->
  104:     [{server_ticket_mode, stateful} | proplists:delete(server_ticket_mode, Config)];
  105: init_per_group(stateless, Config) ->
  106:     [{server_ticket_mode, stateless} | proplists:delete(server_ticket_mode, Config)];
  107: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  108:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config).
  109: 
  110: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  111:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  112: 
  113: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  114:     ssl:stop(),
  115:     application:load(ssl),
  116:     ssl:start(),
  117:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
  118:     Config.
  119: 
  120: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  121:     Config.
  122: 
  123: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  124: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  125: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  126: 
  127: openssl_server_basic() ->
  128:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with session tickets (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  129: openssl_server_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  130:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  131:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  132:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  133: 
  134:     %% Configure session tickets
  135:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, auto},
  136:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  137: 
  138:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [], 
  139:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  140:     
  141:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  142: 
  143:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  144:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  145:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  146:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  147:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  148:                                                 [false, no_reply]}},
  149:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
  150:     %% Wait for session ticket
  151:     ct:sleep(100),
  152: 
  153:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  154:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  155: 
  156:     %% Use ticket
  157:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  158:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  159:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  160:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  161:                                                 [true, no_reply]}},
  162:                                          {from, self()},
  163:                                          {options, ClientOpts}]),
  164:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  165:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  166: 
  167: openssl_client_basic() ->
  168:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with session tickets (openssl client - erlang server)"}].
  169: openssl_client_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  170:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  171:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  172: 
  173:     {_, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  174:     TicketFile0 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket0"]),
  175:     TicketFile1 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket1"]),
  176:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  177: 
  178:     Data = "Hello world",
  179: 
  180:     %% Configure session tickets
  181:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode},
  182:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
  183: 
  184:     Server0 =
  185: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  186: 				   {from, self()},
  187: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  188:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  189:                                           [false]}},
  190: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  191: 
  192:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  193: 
  194:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0}, 
  195:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  196:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_out", TicketFile0]}], Config),
  197: 
  198:     ssl_test_lib:send(Client0, Data),
  199: 
  200:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  201: 
  202:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  203:                                verify_active_session_resumption,
  204:                               [true]}}},
  205:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  206:     %% %% Wait for session ticket
  207:     ct:sleep(100),
  208:     
  209:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0},
  210:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  211:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_in", TicketFile0,
  212:                                                                   "-sess_out", TicketFile1]}], Config),
  213:     
  214: 
  215:     ssl_test_lib:send(Client1, Data),
  216:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  217:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),    
  218:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  219: 
  220: openssl_server_hrr() ->
  221:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with session tickets and hello_retry_request (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  222: openssl_server_hrr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  223:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  224:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  225:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  226: 
  227:     %% Configure session tickets
  228:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, auto},
  229:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  230:                   {supported_groups,[secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts0],
  231: 
  232:     
  233:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{groups, "X448:X25519"}], 
  234:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  235:     
  236:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  237:   
  238: 
  239:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  240:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  241:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  242:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  243:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  244:                                                 [false, no_reply]}},
  245:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts}]),
  246:     %% Wait for session ticket
  247:     ct:sleep(100),
  248: 
  249:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  250:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  251: 
  252:     %% Use ticket
  253:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  254:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  255:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  256:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  257:                                                 [true, no_reply]}},
  258:                                          {from, self()},
  259:                                          {options, ClientOpts}]),
  260:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  261:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  262: 
  263: openssl_client_hrr() ->
  264:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with session tickets and hello_retry_request (openssl client - erlang server)"}].
  265: openssl_client_hrr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  266:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  267:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  268:     {_, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  269:     TicketFile0 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket0"]),
  270:     TicketFile1 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket1"]),
  271:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  272: 
  273:     Data = "Hello world",
  274: 
  275:     %% Configure session tickets
  276:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode},
  277:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  278:                   {supported_groups,[x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
  279: 
  280:     Server0 =
  281: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  282: 				   {from, self()},
  283: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  284:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  285:                                           [false]}},
  286: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  287: 
  288:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  289:     
  290: 
  291:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0}, 
  292:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  293:                                                   {groups,  "P-256:X25519"},
  294:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_out", TicketFile0]}], Config),
  295: 
  296:     ssl_test_lib:send(Client0, Data),
  297: 
  298:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  299: 
  300:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  301:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  302:                               [true]}}},
  303: 
  304:     %% Wait for session ticket
  305:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  306:     ct:sleep(100),
  307: 
  308:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0}, 
  309:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  310:                                                   {groups,  "P-256:X25519"},
  311:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_in", TicketFile0,
  312:                                                                   "-sess_out", TicketFile1]}], Config),
  313:     ssl_test_lib:send(Client1, Data),
  314: 
  315:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  316: 
  317:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  318:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  319: 
  320: openssl_server_hrr_multiple_tickets() ->
  321:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with multiple session tickets and hello_retry_request "
  322:       "(erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  323: openssl_server_hrr_multiple_tickets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  324:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  325:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  326:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  327:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  328: 
  329:     %% Configure session tickets
  330:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, manual},
  331:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  332:                   {supported_groups,[secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts0],
  333: 
  334: 
  335:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{groups, "X448:X25519"}], 
  336:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  337:     
  338:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  339: 
  340:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  341:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  342:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  343:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  344:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  345:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 2}]}},
  346:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
  347: 
  348:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  349: 
  350:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  351: 
  352:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  353:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  354: 
  355:     %% Use tickets
  356:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  357:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  358:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  359:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  360:                                                 [true, no_reply, no_tickets]}},
  361:                                          {from, self()},
  362:                                          {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts]}]),
  363: 
  364:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  365: 
  366:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  367:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  368: 
  369: openssl_server_early_data_basic() ->
  370:     [{doc,"Test early data (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  371: openssl_server_early_data_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  372:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  373:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  374:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  375: 
  376:     %% Configure session tickets
  377:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, auto},
  378:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  379:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  380: 
  381:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 16384}],
  382:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  383: 
  384:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  385: 
  386:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  387:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  388:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  389:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  390:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  391:                                                 [false, no_reply]}},
  392:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  393:     %% Wait for session ticket
  394:     ct:sleep(100),
  395: 
  396:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  397:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  398: 
  399:     %% Use ticket
  400:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  401:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  402:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  403:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  404:                                                 [true, no_reply, no_tickets,
  405:                                                  {verify_early_data, accepted}]}},
  406:                                          {from, self()},
  407:                                          {options, ClientOpts2}]),
  408:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  409:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  410: 
  411: openssl_server_early_data_big() ->
  412:     [{doc,"Send more early data than the max_early_data_size (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  413: openssl_server_early_data_big(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  414:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  415:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  416:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  417: 
  418:     %% Configure session tickets
  419:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, auto},
  420:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  421:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  422: 
  423:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 5}],
  424:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  425: 
  426:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  427: 
  428:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  429:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  430:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  431:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  432:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  433:                                                 [false, no_reply]}},
  434:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  435:     %% Wait for session ticket
  436:     ct:sleep(100),
  437: 
  438:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  439:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  440: 
  441:     %% Use ticket
  442:     %% The tickets received cannot be used for sending more early data than the
  443:     %% max_early_data_size. They are filtered by the automatic ticket handling
  444:     %% mechanism and there will be no session resumption.
  445:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  446:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  447:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  448:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  449:                                                 [false, no_reply, no_tickets]}},
  450:                                          {from, self()},
  451:                                          {options, ClientOpts2}]),
  452:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  453:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  454: 
  455: openssl_server_early_data_manual() ->
  456:     [{doc,"Test sending early data - manual ticket handling (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  457: openssl_server_early_data_manual(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  458:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  459:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  460:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  461:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  462: 
  463:     %% Configure session tickets
  464:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
  465:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  466:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  467: 
  468:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 16384}],
  469:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  470: 
  471:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  472: 
  473:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  474:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  475:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  476:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  477:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  478:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 1}]}},
  479:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  480: 
  481:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  482: 
  483:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  484: 
  485:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  486:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  487: 
  488:     %% Use tickets
  489:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  490:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  491:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  492:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  493:                                                 [true, no_reply, no_tickets,
  494:                                                  {verify_early_data, accepted}]}},
  495:                                          {from, self()},
  496:                                          {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts2]}]),
  497: 
  498:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  499: 
  500:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  501:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  502: 
  503: openssl_server_early_data_manual_big() ->
  504:     [{doc,"Test sending more early data than the max_early_data_size - manual ticket handling "
  505:       "(erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  506: openssl_server_early_data_manual_big(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  507:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  508:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  509:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  510:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  511: 
  512:     %% Configure session tickets
  513:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
  514:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  515:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  516: 
  517:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 5}],
  518:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  519: 
  520:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  521: 
  522:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  523:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  524:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  525:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  526:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  527:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 1}]}},
  528:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  529: 
  530:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  531: 
  532:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  533: 
  534:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  535:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  536: 
  537:     %% Use tickets
  538:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode},
  539:                                                {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  540:                                                {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  541:                                                       verify_active_session_resumption,
  542:                                                       [true, no_reply, no_tickets]}},
  543:                                                {from, self()},
  544:                                                {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts2]}]),
  545:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client1, illegal_parameter),
  546:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  547: 
  548:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  549:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  550: 
  551: openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_tickets() ->
  552:     [{doc,"Test sending early data - manual ticket handling, 2 tickets (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  553: openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_tickets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  554:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  555:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  556:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  557:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  558: 
  559:     %% Configure session tickets
  560:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
  561:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  562:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  563: 
  564:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 16384}],
  565:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  566: 
  567:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  568: 
  569:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  570:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  571:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  572:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  573:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  574:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 2}]}},
  575:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  576: 
  577:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  578: 
  579:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  580: 
  581:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  582:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  583: 
  584:     %% Use tickets
  585:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  586:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  587:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  588:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  589:                                                 [true, no_reply, no_tickets,
  590:                                                  {verify_early_data, accepted}]}},
  591:                                          {from, self()},
  592:                                          {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts2]}]),
  593:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  594: 
  595:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  596:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  597: 
  598: openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_chacha_tickets() ->
  599:     [{doc,"Test sending early data - manual ticket handling, 2 tickets - chacha (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  600: openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_chacha_tickets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  601:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  602:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  603:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  604:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  605: 
  606:     %% Configure session tickets
  607:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
  608:                    {ciphers, ["TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256"]},
  609:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  610:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  611: 
  612:     %% openssl s_server seems to select a cipher_suite that satisfies the requirements
  613:     %% for early_data.
  614:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 16384}],
  615:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  616: 
  617:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  618: 
  619:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  620:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  621:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  622:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  623:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  624:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 2}]}},
  625:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  626: 
  627:     %% Receive 2 tickets that used Chacha20-Poly1305 and sha256
  628:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  629: 
  630:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  631: 
  632:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  633:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  634: 
  635:     %% Use tickets
  636:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  637:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  638:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  639:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  640:                                                 [true, no_reply, no_tickets,
  641:                                                  {verify_early_data, accepted}]}},
  642:                                          {from, self()},
  643:                                          {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts2]}]),
  644:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  645: 
  646:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  647:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  648: 
  649: openssl_client_early_data_basic() ->
  650:     [{doc,"Test early data (openssl client - erlang server)"}].
  651: openssl_client_early_data_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  652:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  653:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  654: 
  655:     {_, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  656:     TicketFile0 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket0"]),
  657:     TicketFile1 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket1"]),
  658:     RequestFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "request"]),
  659:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  660:     %% Create request file to be used with early data
  661:     EarlyData = <<"HEAD / HTTP/1.1\nHost: \nConnection: close\n\n", 0, 0>>,
  662:     create_request(RequestFile, EarlyData),
  663: 
  664:     %% Configure session tickets
  665:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode},
  666:                   {early_data, enabled},
  667:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
  668: 
  669:     Server0 =
  670: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  671: 				   {from, self()},
  672: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  673:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  674:                                           [false]}},
  675: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  676: 
  677:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  678: 
  679:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0},
  680:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  681:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_out", TicketFile0]}], Config),
  682:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  683: 
  684:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  685:                               verify_server_early_data,
  686:                               [wait_reply, EarlyData]}}},
  687: 
  688:     %% %% Wait for session ticket
  689:     ct:sleep(100),
  690:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  691: 
  692:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0},
  693:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  694:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_in", TicketFile0,
  695:                                                                   "-sess_out", TicketFile1,
  696:                                                                   "-early_data", RequestFile]}],
  697:                                         Config),
  698: 
  699:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  700:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  701:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  702: 
  703: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  704: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  705: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  706: 
  707: create_request(File, EarlyData) ->
  708:     {ok, S} = file:open(File, [write]),
  709:     io:format(S, "~s", [binary_to_list(EarlyData)]),
  710:     file:close(S).
  711:
